text: Light Unit Condition/Visibility (note type (color/search, incandescent/LED) & spread)
Timing Devices (include approach stick and/or stick release)
Insulated Joint Conditions (end post intact, tie plates clear, bolts tight, spikes reversed)
Track Bond Conditions (complete, undamaged, secure, ensures conductivity)
Track Lead Conditions (complete, undamaged, secured)
Track Circuit Polarity (staggered and in conformity to the design plan)
Track Circuit Detection (detects a 0.06 ohm shunt, adjustment, no contamination of track circuit, signal in vicinity)
Track Circuit Adjustment
Track Circuit Contamination
Fouling circuit (proper bonding and detects train throughout)
Relay Conditions (securely mounted, contact condition, no rust or debris in housing, properly identified, corresponds to the circuit plan)
Switch Obstruction Test (machine did not lock, overload/resilient gear functions, indication)
Operation of Switches & Derails (power switches, self-restoring and power derails, electric lock, spring switch)
Operation of Switch in Hand Throw Mode (point pressure, mechanical locking, timing)
Switch Circuit Controller (condition of contacts and wiring, mounting secure, clevis tight)
Record of Monthly Tests (no missing or overdue tests)
Record of Quarterly and Semiannual Tests (no missing or overdue tests)
Record of Annual Tests (no missing or overdue tests)
Record of Two Year Tests (no missing or overdue tests)
Record of Four Year Tests (no missing or overdue tests)
Record of Ten Year Tests (no missing or overdue tests)
Standby Battery Conditions (clean & free of corrosion, voltage reading taken pre/post 15 min power off)
Battery Isolation Condition (no voltage potential between power supplies)
Circuit Grounds (no leakage to ground, perform test while system is active and at rest)
AC Power and Components (phases consistent and equal under load)
Design Plan Conditions (complete, accurate, legible, up to date)
Evidence of Trespassing (cut fence, worn footpath, witnessed event)
Persons performing duties did not appear familiar with equipment/components within their responsibility.
Persons performing duties did not appear familiar with the railways inspection and testing requirements, and other procedures.
Persons performing duties did not appear to have an understanding of safety requirements during testing, and/or how to protect safe railway operations during the undertaking of their duties.

Persons performing duties were not able to correctly answer all questions and perform all tasks requested by the RSI at the time of inspection, and/or did not appear confident and knowledgeable when implementing them.
Condition of Structures (masts, ladders, platforms, bases, foundation, junction boxes)
Head Blocks (undamaged, fastening bolts secure, switch machine securely mounted)
Switch Points (aligned, flush against stock rail, riding on all plates, plates lubricated/smooth, movement)
Track Component Condition (MJS clips, gauge plates, rail braces, cotter pins)
Gauge and Connecting Rods (throw, lock, indication rods/bars, not binding on rail or ties)
Power Switch Machine Condition (housing, drainage)
Contact Compartment (terminals, tagging, contact condition, lubrication)
Motor/Gear Compartment (motor, brushes, gear, lubrication)
Helper Assembly (intact, effective)
External Condition of Housing (foundations, door, locks, free of debris)
Internal Condition of Housing (clean, sealed, ventilation, moisture, no evidence of infestation)
Location Conditions (equipment, tagging, wiring, lighting arresters)
Cables and Line Wires (pole line, aerial, underground wire, cable clearance)
Misc. Issues (other safety issues, recurring failure, system malfunction, unnecessary component or wiring)
Light Unit Flash Rate & Operation (flash alternately and uniformly and at the prescribed flash rate)
Signs (wayside operating)
Bridge controller, Signal Control Device (specified device operating as intended)
Timetable, Logbook, Maintenance Manuals (all applicable information available, complete, correct)
Operational Tests (post repair/replacement)
Software and Calibration
